entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mirabel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.8°C

Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 55 %

Wind: NE 9 km/h
